page.title: 04LOCAL SOCIETIES (CONT'D)
page.content: { SENIOR CITIZENS }are people aged over 60. They meet every two weeks.They play whist,bingo and have speakers who give talks.Trips are arranged by the British Legion. {THURSDAY PRODUCE AND CRAFT CLUB}a group of people who sell their cooking and hand made craft goods. Some of the money is sent to Oxfam. {THE WINKLEIGH PARISH CHURCH WIVES {GROUP}Meet once a month with a break during the summer.Each month there is a speaker and the programme is made as varied as possible.The sessions are started with a service in church and also ended that way. {YOUTH CLUB,W.A.S.P.S,GARDERNING CLUB, {YOUNG FARMERS,BINGO,CHAPEL SISTERHOOD, {TODDLERS GROUP.
